2002.subject: NURS
2002.course_title_long: Health Assessment and Promotion Across Lifespan with Lab
2002.descrlong:
Course builds upon student's prior knowledge of health assessment including: history taking, physical examination/diagnostic testing, and health promotion/patient education. Lab activity is essential for this course.  (Department of Nursing consent required.) 

(Coreq: NURS 301)
